replies.message: Hey Vladimir. We're sorry to hear this! If you don't see translations options for comments written in another language, make sure that translation options are turned on for that language. You can learn how here: http://bit.ly/2h9vNNX. If your translation options are turned on and you are still not seeing the option to translate a comment, please report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2hbLJiC. -Elizabeth

Still no translation..
 Very disappointing..
Even the language setting is ON..
